Welcome!

This personal website is firmly and indefinitely a work in progress. I've been playing quite a bit with Github Pages and Jekyll. Eventually there will be some projects linked on the side bar and I hope to add categories and tag sortting functionality to the blog. That said, I first have to make the blog!

With any luck this website will serve as a meandering source of discussion on my technical quandries as I pursue computer science degree with a good bit of photos and stories from my years living in Japan. Thanks for stopping by.
